overview: Gangsta rappers Ice Cube, Mack 10 and WC come together to form Westside Connection, a group dedicated to creating the West Coast rapper's soundtrack. This collection of live performances from the wild West boys includes the hits "Bow Down," "Call 9-1-1," "We Be Clubbin'," "Connected for Life," "Let It Reign," "Hoo Bangin' (WSCG Style)," "Cheddar" and "Foe Life." Extras include interviews and behind-the-scenes footage.
title: Westside Connection: Gangsta Nation Live
